title: Crunchy coconut cookies
ingredients: ['85g (3 oz) unsalted butter, softened', '30g (1 oz) granulated sugar', '30g (1 oz) light brown soft sugar', '110g (4 oz) plain flour', '1 to 2 tablespoons milk', '60g (2 oz) unsweetened dessicated coconut, to taste', '60g (2 oz) dark or milk chocolate (optional)']
